description: A directed taxon relation representing species interactions. Different to a TaxonConceptRelation a species interaction can also point to a species (name) outside of the local dataset.
name: species-interaction
title: Species Interaction

fields.name: taxonID
fields.title: taxonID
fields.description: The subject taxon the species interaction is about. Always required to point to an existing taxonID in the local dataset.

fields.name: relatedTaxonID
fields.title: relatedTaxonID
fields.description: The related taxon this interaction is describing. If given it must refer to a local taxonID from the dataset. If missing, the 'relatedTaxonScientificName' must be given instead.

fields.name: sourceID
fields.title: sourceID
fields.description: Optional identifier for the source this record came from as listed in the metadata.yaml

fields.name: relatedTaxonScientificName
fields.title: relatedTaxonScientificName
fields.description: The scientificName of the related taxon this interaction is describing. Includes the authorship if known. It is mutually exclusive with relatedTaxonID and if given no relatedTaxonID should exist. The relatedTaxonScientificName can be used to document species interactions without the need to have full blown name and taxon records.

fields.name: type
fields.title: type
fields.description: The kind of directed species interaction. Each interaction exists also in reverse to allow the alternative relatedTaxonScientificName field to be used. Species interaction types are heavily inspired by https://www.globalbioticinteractions.org and the OBO Relation Ontology http://www.ontobee.org/ontology/RO to which all entries are mapped.

fields.name: referenceID
fields.title: referenceID
fields.description: A reference where the interaction was documented.

fields.name: modified
fields.title: modified
fields.description: UTC timestamp in ISO format to represent the time the record was last modified.

fields.name: modifiedBy
fields.title: modifiedBy
fields.description: Author identifier indicating the person who has last modified the record.
